channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1403; 06:59PM; 9105 N De Garmo Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ncCEvv; Sun Valley; KNOCKDOWN: LA DWP cut off all power to the structure to ensure it is de-energized and firefighters were able to safely make entry and fully extinguish the fire (trash fire in the electrical room only). The fire did not extend into the structure and there are no injuries reported. No further details.; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 E260 E289 E298 E60 E77 E89 RA98 T60 T89 T98; CH9; 18; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1403; 06:48PM; 9105 N De Garmo Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ncCEvv; Sun Valley; One story (50' x 50') commercial building with an electrical panel visibly arcing (high voltage). The arcing ignited trash on the floor of the room which firefighters carefully extinguished, ensuring they did not apply water to any electrical components. LA DWP is enroute to safely de-energize the building so firefighters can then make entry and fully extinguish any remaining fire. There is currently no extension to the structure itself and no other structures are threatened. No injuries reported. The original 9-1-1 call (6:05PM) came in as a Transformer fire and was then upgraded to a Structure fire. ; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 E260 E289 E298 E60 E77 E89 RA98 T60 T89 T98; CH9; 18; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1285; 05:18PM; 1866 N Rowan Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Z6P8lz; El Sereno; KNOCKDOWN: 18 firefighters extinguished the fire in 16 minutes with no injuries reported. The single family dwelling was defended from any fire damage. The cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 16; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E1 E201 E47 RA1 T1; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1285; 05:02PM; 1866 N Rowan Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Z6P8lz; El Sereno; One story, detached garage (behind a single family dwelling) with smoke showing upon LAFD arrival. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 16; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E1 E201 E47 RA1 T1; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0260; 06:52AM; 11455 W Cumpston St; MAP: https://bit.ly/42rUn25; North Hollywood; Building type update: The original fire unit (appears to be) an apartment building which was in the framing stags and fully involved in fire upon LAFD arrival. The Alpha side (to the front) exposure was also under construction (appears to be apartments) and sustained some fire damage. The exposures surrounding the fire building (on the Brave, Charlie and Delta sides) were defended from any damage and all occupants (numbers unknown) are being rehoused with no injuries reported. The cause is under investigation. No further details.; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 BC5 CM40 CM42 E102 E108 E227 E235 E239 E260 E261 E278 E289 E60 E76 E77 E86 E89 E97 EA1 EM14 HR3 RA60 RA86 RA889 RA89 T27 T35 T39 T60 T61 T78 T89 UR88 UR89; CH8; 13 18; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0260; 06:30AM; 11455 W Cumpston St; MAP: https://bit.ly/42rUn25; North Hollywood; KNOCKDOWN: 100 firefighters extinguished the fire in 47 minutes with no injuries reported. The three story building was in the framing stages of construction and was well involved in fire upon LAFD arrival. Firefighters successfully defended the surrounding buildings from an extension, preventing the displacement of those occupants. LAFD apparatus will remain on scene through the morning conducting overhaul and ensuring all hot spots are extinguished. Commuters are advised to avoid Cumpston St between Camellia Ave and Tujunga Ave. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 BC5 CM40 CM42 E102 E108 E227 E235 E239 E260 E261 E278 E289 E60 E76 E77 E86 E89 E97 EA1 EM14 HR3 RA60 RA86 RA889 RA89 T27 T35 T39 T60 T61 T78 T89 UR88 UR89; CH9; 13 18; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0260; 05:43AM; 11455 W Cumpston St; MAP: https://bit.ly/42rUn25; #NorthHollywood; Three-story apartment under construction, with heavy fire showing. Defensive mode.; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 BC5 CM40 CM42 E102 E108 E227 E235 E239 E260 E261 E278 E289 E60 E76 E77 E86 E89 E97 EA1 EM14 HR3 RA60 RA86 RA889 RA89 T27 T35 T39 T60 T61 T78 T89 UR88 UR89; CH9; 13 18; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0121; 02:10AM; 444 S Boyle Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/401qgNb; #BoyleHeights; Firefighters battled for 54 minutes to extinguish the stubborn flames which were embedded throughout the vacant two-story house, including in the floors, walls, and attic. It took the relentless effort of 76 LAFD firefighters to completely snuff out the flames, using defensive, then transitional, and finally offensive tactics. Thankfully, there were no reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E17 E2 E202 E203 E209 E220 E25 E3 E4 EA1 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA2 RA25 RA3 RA4 RA803 SQ21 T2 T20 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 14 15 16; Nicholas Prange

Update Structure Fire; INC#0121; 02:50AM; 444 S Boyle Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/401qgNb; #BoyleHeights; After 40 minutes, firefighters continue to battle the flames in the two-story home. The fire ground tactics have been mostly defensive so far, but firefighters are starting to cautiously make entry into the heavily damaged structure to get better access with hose streams.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E17 E2 E202 E203 E209 E220 E25 E3 E4 EA1 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA2 RA25 RA3 RA4 RA803 SQ21 T2 T20 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 14 15 16; Nicholas Prange
